```{r setup, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(Hmisc)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggforce)
library(dplyr)
library(zoo)
library(ggpubr)
```

```{r functions}
read_data <- function(file) {
  df <- read_excel(file)
  df$PATIENT_ID <- na.locf(df$PATIENT_ID)
  df <- na.locf(df)
  df <- df %>%
    mutate(gender = replace(gender, gender == 1, "Male"), gender = replace(gender, gender == 2, "Female"), 
           outcome = replace(outcome, outcome == 0, "Survived"), outcome = replace(outcome, outcome == 1, "Death")) %>%
    group_by(PATIENT_ID) %>% 
    summarise(albumin=last(albumin), Outcome=last(outcome), n=n())
  df
}

df <- read_data("data/time_series_375_prerpocess_en.xlsx")
```

```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(x=Outcome, y=albumin, color=Outcome)) + 
    geom_hline(aes(yintercept=35), colour="#555555", linetype="dashed") + 
  geom_hline(aes(yintercept=55), colour="#555555", linetype="dashed") + 
  geom_sina()   + 
  stat_summary(fun.data = "mean_sdl",  fun.args = list(mult = 1), 
               geom = "pointrange", color = "black") +
  theme_classic() + 
  theme(legend.position = "none", axis.text = element_text(colour = "black", size=18), 
        text = element_text(size=18), axis.title.y = element_text(margin = margin(t = 0, r = 18, b = 0, l = 0))) + 
  xlab("") + ylab ("Patient's albumin level (g/L)") +scale_color_manual(values=c("#EE6677", "#4477AA"))
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
ggsave("plots/albumin_level_sina_plot.svg", width=6, height=6, units="in")
ggsave("plots/albumin_level_sina_plot.png", width=6, height=6, units="in")
```

```{r}
print(tapply(df$albumin, df$Outcome, length))
print(tapply(df$albumin, df$Outcome, median))
```
